channel.title: Mopar Sponsor
channel.description: I know I'm late on applying for a mopar sponsor, but I wasn't aware there was some sort of a time limit. I'm still rather interested in purchasing and being sponsored by mopar this month though. Was just wondering if there was room for one more person to be bidding to be one of the top 10 sponsored.

item.title: Mopar Sponsor
item.dc:creator: @DivineFate DivineFate
item.description:
@DivineFate wrote:

Tom:

There is no functionality in place to add people onto anything, you either make it within the allotted period or you don’t. There have been instances in the past where applications have been approved between the 1st and the 10th of the month but I’m unable to find your application.

That is weird. I posted one this afternoon and said it needed to be mod approved. I’ll repost the application here.

IP: divinefate.no-ip.org
Port: 43594
Forums or website, if any: divinefate-rsps.com

  1. Do you sell anything on your server for real world or real runescape money or items? Such as items, levels, or mod or admin positions? Please state (generally) what you sell.
    I currently am selling items, the money obtained from this will be used for the server to buy sponsorship such as from moparscape and other places/toplists to bring in more players and used for client services that we will need because we don’t really have an official client developer.

  2. What client version do you use? 317 or what?
    317

  3. Do you offer an unsigned client people can use?
    No, I currently have my jar signed and it’s used for the webclient and players are also to download it and use it as a desktop client.

  4. Do you require people to use your client?
    Yes

  5. Do you allow people to use the moparscape client on your server?
    I would, but I’m not sure if the Mopar client is compatible with the sever

  6. How much will you be willing to pay monthly through paypal? (minimum is $30, must go in increments of $5 up from there)
    30-50

  7. Do you accept donations? If so, what do you accept as donations?
    We accept all donations via PayPal, rsgp and rs account donations. We eventually find a way to turn it into money and use it to benefit the server

Add any other info you feel relevant down here:
We’ve worked hard on the server for a good month and a half and have been looking to release, but never found a reliable release date. So if we were to get a sponsor from Mopar, that would motivate us to open as it’ll hopefully bring in a good amount of traffic. I don’t have any other reliable sites I can buy sponsorship from that won’t cost me a fortune. And seeing as my partner will be shipping off to boot camp around a month or two, I want to make this happen this month and until he’s shipped.

Read full topic

first rule of gaining sponsorship is admitting that I am superior… true story
